description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共吉林省委副书记、吉林省人大常委会副主任。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, who served as Deputy Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CCP and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Jilin Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省下辖的县级市，是马俊清的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Jilin Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国吉林省长春市的综合性大学，是马俊清的母校。
description.en: A comprehensive university located in Changchun, Jilin Province, China, and the alma mater of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在吉林省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Jilin Province.

nodes.id: 吉林省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 吉林省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 吉林省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing committee of the Jilin Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团吉林省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团吉林省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团在吉林省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Youth League of China in Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 吉林省各青年团体的联合组织。
description.en: A federation of youth organizations in Jilin Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党松原市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党松原市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在松原市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Songyuan City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省松原市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Songyuan City, Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党四平市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党四平市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在四平市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Siping City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马俊清的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马俊清的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马俊清的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马俊清的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马俊清的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，与马俊清有职务交接关系。
description.en: Chinese politician, had a handover of duties with Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马俊清的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马俊清的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马俊清的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马俊清的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马俊清的前任。
description.en: Chinese politician, predecessor of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，马俊清的继任者。
description.en: Chinese politician, successor of Ma Junqing.

description.zh-cn: 马俊清出生于吉林公主岭。
description.en: Ma Junqing was born in Gongzhuling, Jilin.

description.zh-cn: 马俊清毕业于吉林大学经济管理专业，获研究生学历和经济学博士学位。
description.en: Ma Junqing graduated from Jilin University with a major in Economic Management, holding a postgraduate degree and a Ph.D. in Economics.

description.zh-cn: 马俊清于1976年3月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Ma Junqing joined the Communist Party of China in March 1976.

relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团吉林省委员会

position.en: Deputy Secretary, Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group

description.zh-cn: 1986年1月起，马俊清任共青团吉林省委副书记、党组副书记。
description.en: Starting from January 1986, Ma Junqing served as Deputy Secretary and Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League.

description.zh-cn: 马俊清曾担任吉林省青联主席。
description.en: Ma Junqing served as the Chairman of the Jilin Provincial Youth Federation.

relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团吉林省委员会

position.en: Secretary, Secretary of the Party Leadership Group

description.zh-cn: 1992年1月，马俊清任共青团吉林省委书记、党组书记。
description.en: In January 1992, Ma Junqing became the Secretary and Secretary of the Party Leadership Group of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League.

relationships.target: 中国共产党松原市委员会

description.zh-cn: 1995年1月至2000年12月，马俊清任中共松原市委副书记。
description.en: From January 1995 to December 2000, Ma Junqing served as the Deputy Secretary of the Songyuan Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 1997年1月，马俊清任松原市人民政府代市长，后任市长。
description.en: In January 1997, Ma Junqing became the acting mayor of Songyuan Municipal People's Government, and later the mayor.

relationships.target: 中国共产党四平市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2000年12月，马俊清任中共四平市委书记。
description.en: In December 2000, Ma Junqing became the Secretary of the Siping Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 2003年1月，马俊清任吉林省人民政府秘书长。
description.en: In January 2003, Ma Junqing became the Secretary-General of the Jilin Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

position.en: Standing Committee Member, Head of the Propaganda Department

description.zh-cn: 2004年12月，马俊清任中共吉林省委常委、宣传部部长。
description.en: In December 2004, Ma Junqing became a member of the Standing Committee and Head of the Propaganda Department of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CCP.

relationships.target: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

description.zh-cn: 2007年5月，马俊清任吉林省委常委、省委秘书长。
description.en: In May 2007, Ma Junqing became a member of the Standing Committee and Secretary-General of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 2008年8月，马俊清任吉林省人民政府副省长，2012年5月升任常务副省长。
description.en: In August 2008, Ma Junqing was appointed Vice Governor of Jilin Provincial People's Government, and was promoted to Executive Vice Governor in May 2012.

relationships.target: 中国共产党吉林省委员会

description.zh-cn: 2015年11月20日，马俊清任中共吉林省委副书记。
description.en: On November 20, 2015, Ma Junqing was appointed Deputy Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CCP.

relationships.target: 吉林省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月19日，马俊清当选为吉林省人民代表大会常务委员会副主任。
description.en: On January 19, 2017, Ma Junqing was elected as Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Jilin Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 马俊清接替竺延风出任中国共产党吉林省委员会专职副书记。
description.en: Ma Junqing succeeded Zhu Yanfeng as the full-time Deputy Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 高广滨接替马俊清出任中国共产党吉林省委员会专职副书记。
description.en: Gao Guangbin succeeded Ma Junqing as the full-time Deputy Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 马俊清接替李申学出任中国共产党吉林省委员会秘书长。
description.en: Ma Junqing succeeded Li Shenxue as the Secretary-General of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 房俐接替马俊清出任中国共产党吉林省委员会秘书长。
description.en: Fang Li succeeded Ma Junqing as the Secretary-General of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 马俊清接替邓凯出任中国共产党吉林省委员会宣传部部长。
description.en: Ma Junqing succeeded Deng Kai as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 荀凤栖接替马俊清出任中国共产党吉林省委员会宣传部部长；此前，马俊清接替荀凤栖出任中国共产党四平市委员会书记。
description.en: Xun Fengqi succeeded Ma Junqing as the Head of the Propaganda Department of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CCP; previously, Ma Junqing had succeeded Xun Fengqi as the Secretary of the Siping Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 张元富接替马俊清出任中国共产党四平市委员会书记。
description.en: Zhang Yuanfu succeeded Ma Junqing as the Secretary of the Siping Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 马俊清的前任吉林省人民政府常务副省长为竺延风。
description.en: Ma Junqing's predecessor as Executive Vice Governor of the Jilin Provincial People's Government was Zhu Yanfeng.

description.zh-cn: 高广滨接替马俊清出任吉林省人民政府常务副省长。
description.en: Gao Guangbin succeeded Ma Junqing as the Executive Vice Governor of the Jilin Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 马俊清接替矫正中出任吉林省人民政府秘书长。
description.en: Ma Junqing succeeded Jiao Zhengzhong as the Secretary-General of the Jilin Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 刘润璞接替马俊清出任吉林省人民政府秘书长。
description.en: Liu Runpu succeeded Ma Junqing as the Secretary-General of the Jilin Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 马俊清接替柏承强出任松原市人民政府市长。
description.en: Ma Junqing succeeded Bai Chengqiang as the Mayor of the Songyuan Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 高广滨接替马俊清出任松原市人民政府市长。
description.en: Gao Guangbin succeeded Ma Junqing as the Mayor of the Songyuan Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 马俊清接替王儒林出任中国共产主义青年团吉林省委员会书记。
description.en: Ma Junqing succeeded Wang Rulin as the Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League of China.

description.zh-cn: 金振吉接替马俊清出任中国共产主义青年团吉林省委员会书记。
description.en: Jin Zhenji succeeded Ma Junqing as the Secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League of China.
